hero.title: Hello! I'm Bryan, a frontend software engineer.
descriptions: I'm a passionate developer specializing in building intuitive, dynamic web and mobile experiences. With professional expertise in React, React Native, and TypeScript, I create applications that seamlessly combine functionality and elegance.

From crafting live class platforms for hundreds of users to developing fintech solutions that boost engagement, I thrive on turning ideas into impactful, user-centered products. Clean code, attention to detail, and a commitment to continuous improvement are at the core of my work.
I'm currently looking for part time opportunities and excitng projects to collaborate on. Hire me?

bulletPoints: Implement and mantained unit tests for a design system using React
Review and contribute to the development of a design system
Developed and sent React and React Native applications for production deployments to the internet and to mobile app stores
Integrated third-party APIs for enhanced functionality, such as payment gateways and authentication services expanding the product capabilities
Collaborated with UX/UI designers to translate wireframes and mockups into interactive web applications
Conducted comprehensive testing of features and functionalities, granting approval for the successful deployment of multiple mobile application releases
Developed automated end-to-end tests for a web application using Cypress, achieving a test coverage of 78.5% and ensuring robust quality assurance
Established and managed a repository of 400+ test cases in TestRail, ensuring meticulous documentation and upholding stringent quality standards across applications
Achieved Magna Cum Laude honors Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, reflecting dedication to academic excellence and proficiency in subject matter
Led the creation of multiple projects, gaining practical skills and mastering modern technologies in the field

projects.title: Selected projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some side projects I've worked on

projects.title: Todify • Todo List
projects.imageAlt: Image of the Todo List project
projects.description: Built a user-friendly todo list app using React and Tailwind CSS. Integrated IndexedDB for local storage, allowing users to create, mark as done, and delete tasks directly in their browsers. Simplifies task management with an intuitive interface for efficient organization.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.description: Have a question, a project in mind, or need a software developer? I'd love to hear from you! Feel free to reach out through my LinkedIn or my email:
contact.githubDescription: I'm always eager to explore new opportunities and collaborate on exciting projects. Don't hesitate to reach out—I'm looking forward to connecting with you! If you're interested in exploring more of my work, you can check my Github profile for a list of my projects.
